item.title: Reply to 'How to express "never" with java.util.Date?' on stackoverflow at https://stackoverflow.com/questions/2027171/how-to-express-never-with-java-util-date:
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
Reply to 'How to express "never" with java.util.Date?' on stackoverflow at https://stackoverflow.com/questions/2027171/how-to-express-never-with-java-util-date:

I would just choose a far-future date as the value for the constant NEVER. Then to check for deletion/expiry, just compare against NEVER.
